content.raw:
After the last update and reinstall (2 weeks back) while Val has become more stable and does not fall. I am having issues with camera ML. I have updated the launch files and package.xml as per the #!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/12/added-stereo-image-processing-to-launch/diff

But my multisense camera is not working, it gives a completely black image, no matter what.
content.html:
After the last update and reinstall (2 weeks back) while Val has become more stable and does not fall. I am having issues with camera ML. I have updated the launch files and package.xml as per the #!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/12/added-stereo-image-processing-to-launch/diff

But my multisense camera is not working, it gives a completely black image, no matter what.
